thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com
thread.title: Caroline A Haenel
thread.title_full: Fabletics reviewed by Caroline A Haenel

author: Caroline A Haenel
title: Caroline A Haenel
text: I haven't had a problem with CS they are actually nice. They take things back without question. Free return shipping as well.I haven't needed to return many items . Sizing is pretty consistent so when you find your correct size this will be your size. Although I do read reviews so if I want a larger fit as I normally do I order up.
